entry.title: Thursday: Periods of ice pellets. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets late this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets early this evening. Periods of ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to periods of snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
